mutants.code:
import re

def retrieve_tuples(string):
    pattern = ''
    matches = re.findall(pattern, string)
    filtered_tuples = [(name, age) for (name, age) in matches if name[0].lower() not in 'aeiou']
    sorted_tuples = sorted(filtered_tuples, key=lambda x: len(x[0]), reverse=True)
    return sorted_tuples

mutants.mutated_line: filtered_tuples = [(name, age) for (name, age) in matches if name[0].lower() in 'aeiou']
mutants.code:
import re

def retrieve_tuples(string):
    pattern = "\\('([a-zA-Z]+)', (\\d+)\\)"
    matches = re.findall(pattern, string)
    filtered_tuples = [(name, age) for (name, age) in matches if name[0].lower() in 'aeiou']
    sorted_tuples = sorted(filtered_tuples, key=lambda x: len(x[0]), reverse=True)
    return sorted_tuples

mutants.original_line: sorted_tuples = sorted(filtered_tuples, key=lambda x: len(x[0]), reverse=True)
mutants.mutated_line: sorted_tuples = sorted(filtered_tuples, key=lambda x: len(x[0]), reverse=False)

import re

def retrieve_tuples(string):
    pattern = "\\('([a-zA-Z]+)', (\\d+)\\)"
    matches = re.findall(pattern, string)
    filtered_tuples = [(name, age) for (name, age) in matches if name[1].lower() not in 'aeiou']
    sorted_tuples = sorted(filtered_tuples, key=lambda x: len(x[0]), reverse=True)
    return sorted_tuples
